widget.name: devcon-mobile
widget.description:
The official app for the MSCC Devevelopers Conference 2016, built to be your co-pilot to navigate the conference.
-- Explore the conference agenda, with details on themes, topics and speakers -- Add events to a personalised schedule -- Get reminders before events in “My schedule” start -- Guide yourself using the vector-based conference map -- Follow public social I/O related conversations on Twitter -- Use the Widget to check your upcoming events directly from your home screen
*Exclusive for In person attendees:* -- Take advantage of facilitated pre-event WiFi configuration
widget.author: Jeshan G. BABOOA
